metadata.title: CVE-2016-6333 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in the CSS user subpage previewfeature in MediaWiki before 1.23.15, 1.26.x before 1.26.4, and 1.27.xbefore 1.27.1 allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script orHTML via the edit box in Special:MyPage/common.css.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-6333` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

mediawiki - 1.27.1
mediawiki-classes - 1.27.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: mediawiki package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.27.1').
